LanguageData.USAC_Bullet_GrenadeRound.label: programmable shaped charge
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_BattleRifle.label: Advanced battle rifle
LanguageData.USAC_Gun_BattleRifle.description: M29 "SABR", an infantry weapon platform integrated automatic rifle and grenade launcher, capable of both direct fire suppression and indirect fire support. Although heavy, it boasts excellent aiming accuracy, making it ideal for use as a gunner's weapon in small units.
